Articles.Content:
Just landed an 18t automatic rover with crew space on Minmus, then followed it up with a manned lander. However, when I reached where I left the rover, it was gone. It wasn't in the tracking station either.

Only thing I can think of is it couldn't decide if the rover was landed or not; it's engines were still attached, on the map the ap/pe were jumping around and it took a few times pressing ESC before Space Center wasn't greyed out.

Did the game decide it wasn't actually landed, but a ship that had just crashed..?

hmm, weird. did you've set persistent debris to 0?

or... did you clicked "End Flight" instead of "Tracking Station"? That would be nasty
